item.title: Quotes, mottos & adages - Cytaty, motta i powiedzenia - 2020
item.description: A bunch of my favourite quotes, mottos & adages I’ve accrued over time. In English I’ve had a lot of worries in my life, most of which never happened. – Mark Twain ðŸ’ªðŸ’ªðŸ’ªðŸ’ªðŸ’ªðŸ’ª There are three sides to every story: yours, mine, and the truth and no one is lying. – Anonymous ðŸ’ªðŸ’ªðŸ’ª Change is the only constant. – Unknown Change begets change as much as repetition reinforces repetition. – Bill Drayton The shortest path to oneself leads around the world.
